title: I'll Let You Touch My Tail
alternative_title: I'll Touch the Fox's Tail for You ; 狐狸尾巴给你摸 ; Húlí Wěibā Gěi Nǐ Mō
status: I'll Touch the Fox's Tail for You ; 狐狸尾巴给你摸 ; Húlí Wěibā Gěi Nǐ Mō
description:
Description :
        In order to repay the kindness of saving his life, the little fox wants to make the Unsmiling Wolf smile once! Even if the little fox has to step into the realm of half animal, half humanity, becoming a strange creature with ears and a tail
"But as long as I am here, you will never be alone
